name: Monster Living in a Cave Terrorizes Nearby Village!
name_original: Monster Living in a Cave Terrorizes Nearby Village!
description:
Game about attacking villagers while they try to run away during the turn-based combat.

Pick 3 actions out of 6 to do each turn.

Use mouse or/and keyboard to play.

Made for LD#33.

UPDATE 18.9 Changed way healing and eating works, now your max health increases by eating more than before in a day.
